name: Ni no Kuni: Cross Worlds
description: Ni no Kuni: Cross Worlds is a role-playing game created by Netmarble and published by Level-5 released for Android and iOS in Japan. It was first revealed at "G-Star", in November 2019, and Tokyo Game Show presented the first gameplay footage in September 2020.[2] On May 15th 2021, it was announced that the game would be released on June 10th of the same year.
